member.name: T:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteFilterMode
member.summary: Specifies how text in the text box portion of the control is used to filter items specified by the property for display in the drop-down.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteFilterMode.None
member.summary: Specifies that no filter is used. All items are returned.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteFilterMode.StartsWith
member.summary: Specifies a culture-sensitive, case-insensitive filter where the returned items start with the specified text. The filter uses the method, specifying as the string comparison criteria.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteFilterMode.StartsWithCaseSensitive
member.summary: Specifies a culture-sensitive, case-sensitive filter where the returned items start with the specified text. The filter uses the method, specifying as the string comparison criteria.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteFilterMode.StartsWithOrdinal
member.summary: Specifies an ordinal, case-insensitive filter where the returned items start with the specified text. The filter uses the method, specifying as the string comparison criteria.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteFilterMode.StartsWithOrdinalCaseSensitive
member.summary: Specifies an ordinal, case-sensitive filter where the returned items start with the specified text. The filter uses the method, specifying as the string comparison criteria.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteFilterMode.Contains
member.summary: Specifies a culture-sensitive, case-insensitive filter where the returned items contain the specified text.

member.summary: Specifies a culture-sensitive, case-sensitive filter where the returned items contain the specified text.

member.summary: Specifies an ordinal, case-sensitive filter where the returned items contain the specified text.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteFilterMode.Equals
member.summary: Specifies a culture-sensitive, case-insensitive filter where the returned items equal the specified text. The filter uses the method, specifying as the search comparison criteria.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteFilterMode.EqualsCaseSensitive
member.summary: Specifies a culture-sensitive, case-sensitive filter where the returned items equal the specified text. The filter uses the method, specifying as the string comparison criteria.

member.summary: Specifies an ordinal, case-insensitive filter where the returned items equal the specified text. The filter uses the method, specifying as the string comparison criteria.

member.summary: Specifies an ordinal, case-sensitive filter where the returned items equal the specified text. The filter uses the method, specifying as the string comparison criteria.

member.summary: Represents the filter used by the control to determine whether an item is a possible match for the specified text.
